title: Licensing of Radioactive Materials
content:
Licensing of Radioactive Materials

State Regulations
§ 16.100 - Licensing requirements for use of radioactive materials
§ 16.101 - General licenses
§ 16.102 - Applications for specific licenses
§ 16.103 - General requirements for issuing specific licenses
§ 16.104 - Conditions of specific licenses
§ 16.105 - Duration, expiration and termination of specific licenses
§ 16.106 - Renewal or amendment of specific licenses
§ 16.107 - Amendment, suspension or revocation of licenses
§ 16.108 - Repealed

§ 16.110 - Licensure and inspection of radioactive materials; fees authorized
§ 16.111 - Transfer of radioactive material
§ 16.112 - Fingerprinting and criminal background check requirements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
